Level Four
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Explorer Archive (Game Boy Color): Strategy: Level Four
By Y.K.TAN on Saturday, July 14, 2001 - 05:26 am:

STAGE 4

At the start of the stage,move right once,and you can get the Golden Key. Move right ALL THE WAY,and after that,jump on the metal block,on your right. Face left,and stand on the tip on the metal block. And the Jell will move left all the way,and you destroy the box,and the Jell will fall to it's death. Re-Create the box,after the Jell die,and go ALL THE WAY LEFT,and jump up the metal block,and create two boxes,on your left/underneath. Than wait for the "flying mummy ghost"(that's why I call it.)come above you,and fly left,and take this opportunity,and move all the way right quickly,and jump on top the metal block. You will get a firework. Create Box,and use the firework to kill the puncho. IF YOU ARE REALLY SKILLFUL,create boxes from where you stand at the tip there,and once the puncho comes,destroy the box,and the puncho will fall down,and you can dash all the way to the end,NOW LYOU WIN STAGE 4.
